attributes.action: David Cameron & other Politicians should accept their share of responsibility for the riots.
attributes.additional_details: we the undersigned believe that the current Prime Minister David Cameron, Nick Clegg, and previous leaders/MP. Should all should accept responsibility for their polices of cuts and all policies and continued actions and words of disenfranchisement and treating people as worthless (now and over the last 30+ years) that have led to the current riots etc. in London. Instead of publicly shutting or shouting down anyone who tries to even slightly suggest their might be a link to the cuts.
